sn37.9:1.1: “Pancahi, anuruddha, dhammehi samannagato matugamo …pe… apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati.
sn37.9:1.3: Assaddho ca hoti, ahiriko ca hoti, anottappi ca hoti, aticari ca hoti, duppanno ca hoti—
sn37.9:1.4: imehi kho, anuruddha, pancahi dhammehi samannagato matugamo …pe… upapajjati”ti.
